connect.strong1: Great things always start with a chat!
connect.text: Whether you're a recruiter, a tech fan, or a creative partner, I'd love to hear from you.
connect.strong2: Let's make awesome ideas happen together.

contact.textarea-error: Please share your proposal before sending
contact.rate-limit-blocked: Sending limit reached. Please try again later.

notifications.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
notifications.error-default: Error sending message. Please try again.
notifications.error-config: Configuration error. Please contact the administrator.
notifications.error-recaptcha: Security verification error. Please try again.
notifications.rate-limit-exceeded: You have reached the sending limit. You can send again in {{time}}.
